a.title: Delayed Opening and Half-Day Dismissal Times

div.a: Delayed Opening and Half-Day Dismissal Times

nav.div: Egg Harbor Township School District » Community Resources » Emergency School Closure Info

strong.span: PLEASE DO NOT CONTACT THE EHT POLICE DEPARTMENT ABOUT SCHOOL CLOSURES!

br.br:
The listed home phone number of students will receive a phone call from the Superintendent announcing the closing through School Messenger and through the School Messenger App (available on iPhone and Android).
An Alert Message will also be posted on the District Home Page.
Further more, school closings will be announced at the following resources:

div.div:
13 Swift Drive, Egg Harbor Township, NJ 08234
Phone 609-646-7911 | Fax
